conclusion: Analyze paths of liquid flow from A, B, C to D, E, F, G
Liquids released from A, B, C at top
Liquids flow downward under gravity
Colored baffle sticks placed in path
Containers labeled D, E, F, G at bottom
Liquid from A flows straight down until it hits an obstacle
First obstacle for A is light blue/teal horizontal stick
Liquid from A diverted to the left by teal stick
Liquid from A continues downward after diversion
Liquid from A encounters green vertical stick on left
Green stick guides liquid from A further downward
Liquid from A reaches container D
Liquid from B flows straight down initially
Liquid from B hits red diagonal stick in middle
Red stick guides liquid from B toward the left
Liquid from B continues downward after red stick
Liquid from B directed toward container E
Liquid from C flows straight down initially
Liquid from C encounters yellow horizontal stick on right
Yellow stick diverts liquid from C to the right
Liquid from C continues downward after diversion
Liquid from C influenced by white diagonal stick
Liquid from C directed toward container G
Final answer: A to D, B to E, C to G
